entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
